conclusion: Determine work done by gas from state D to A.
Transition from D to A is an isobaric process at pressure p1.
Initial volume at D is V2; final volume at A is V1.
Change in volume ΔV is V1 - V2.
Work done in isobaric process is W = pΔV.
Since V1 < V2, ΔV is negative, work done by gas is negative.
Final answer: Work done by gas is -p1(V1 - V2).
